# EXISTING STRUCTURES

- Transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities without fuel
- Ensure that burner entities have fuel before using them.
- Check the status of burner entities to ensure they are not out of fuel.

### Errors when using entities without ingredients
- Ensure that entities have the necessary ingredients before using them.
- Check the status of entities to ensure they are not missing ingredients.

### Errors when using entities without being connected to a network
- Ensure that entities are connected to the necessary networks (e.g. electric, fluid) before using them.
- Check the status of entities to ensure they are properly connected.

### Errors when using entities without being plugged into an electric network
- Ensure that entities are plugged into an electric network before using them.
- Check the status of entities to ensure they are properly plugged in.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
No important variables have been assigned.
